name: Hentai Waifu II - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The Hentai Waifu II - Original soundtrack is a pack with all the 8 Original tracks made for the game. Now you can relax with the songs of the game while doing anything else!

  • Luce - 4:59
  • Panchina - 4:21
  • Piccola Canzone - 4:24
  • Stringhe - 5:05
  • Caminare - 4:14
  • Dimenticato - 4:36
  • Un Altro Pezzo - 04:14
  • Hentai Waifu - Trailer Song - 0:59

The Songs are on MP3 format and can be found on the game's folder.
'\Steam\steamapps\common\Hentai Waifu II\Soundtrack'

  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHZ or Better

  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 or later
